name: Notion Startup OS Template
description: Looking to streamline your business's project management? I might have something for you. As a Notion Certified Consultant, I've helped over 30 businesses set up their company workspace on Notion, and their issues were always the same: "We want everything to be interconnected" "We want to keep track of tasks, projects, meetings, and goals" "We want to understand where our time is spent and how much it costs" "We use too many different tools” "We want personal dashboards for everybody" I'm always
features: "We want everything to be interconnected"; "We want to keep track of tasks, projects, meetings, and goals"; "We want to understand where our time is spent and how much it costs"; "We use too many different tools”; "We want personal dashboards for everybody"
